title: Shiguang Dailiren (Link Click)
synopsis: It is said that a picture is worth a thousand words. In this case, it holds an infinite amount of secrets. These are secrets that only Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang are able to find. In a small shop called "Time Photo Studio," the two friends provide a special service: using their extraordinary powers that let them enter photographs, they jump into pictures brought to them by clients in order to grant their wishes. Through the eyes of the photographer, they live through the events surrounding the picture and try to decipher how to solve their client's request.
related_anime: ['Shiguang Dailiren Specials', 'Shiguang Dailiren 2nd Season', 'Shiguang Dailiren Fan Wai Pian: Biwu Zhaoqin']
characters: ['Cheng, Xiaoshi', 'Lu, Guang', 'Qiao, Ling', 'Liu, Min', 'Yu, Xia', 'Lin, Zhen']
